extendedInfo.description: Fish-O-Meter PRO - Live Wallpaper*****You think empty aquariums are boring? Try to catch them, if you want ;-)*****The Fish-O-Meter includes the following features:- personal settings- two Aquariums (Background-Scenes)- adjustable speed- changeable amount of population- switch Battery mode on/off_______________________________________You want more?
